sentence: Our room was spacious and kept very clean our maid service was excelent• Naos restaurant served up diverse buffet offerings for breakfast and lunch
We also had access to our own concierge desk and check out
Provided us with exceptional concierge attention
The wait staff in the restaurants especially Kauil Roberto and Arturo in the NAOS restaurant were terrific

Our waiters were exceptional and gave us the best service especially Roberto from Mole Bluegrass Leobardo from Vento Pablo from Naos and a fellow from Bana in the picture that we did not get the name of Bana was our favorite the food was delicious
Service was great and attentive
The entire staff was friendly and wonderful
We did the Family Concierge Service and our concierges Maria and Gloria were great
Great service and amazing people
Royal service offers you two people called mayordomos they will be in charge of all your reservations per your request
We found it really strange that they moved us to a room which they knew would be disrupted by the building work – not very good customer service
Family concierge is a must with kids
We did stay in the adult only with butler service
Service is so spotty but heck we chalked it up to being in MexicoLast tip before I leave you
IF YOU HAVE ANY PLANS ON GOING TO MEXICO THIS IS THE HOTEL YOU SHOULD STAY INFrom cleanliness to wonderful staff to the number of restaurant
My husband stayed in the room and ordered room service while my eldest daughter and I wandered desolate halls looking for food
The timeshare pitch does n’t stop at check in they call you and let you know someone has a gift for you at the front desk and just ask for Carlos to pick it up
there is club Melia concierge then RCI concierge and it is in 2 different buildings and the lobby is the main building is huge with a front desk but also desks near the elevators
I got lost and saw a staff member and asked him if he could show me where my room was

As a result rather than guests returning towels to the staff in the towel shack the towels were left on lounge chairs making other guests believe that the lounges were being occupied and not available
